summary: A unit‑test suite that validates the TvltProcessor’s components and behavior, checking that its feature extractor and image processor are correctly instantiated, that model input names are as expected, that the processor functions properly, and that the processor can be saved and reloaded from pretrained weights.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the TvltProcessor for downstream image‑text applications by catching regressions early, confirming proper serialization, and ensuring reliable integration in production pipelines.
